scripts.snippet: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW invoice_lines_view AS SELECT invoice_lines.id AS id, invoice_lines.jsonb AS jsonb, jsonb_build_object('acqUnitIds', invoices.jsonb->'acqUnitIds') || invoice_lines.jsonb AS metadata FROM invoice_lines LEFT JOIN invoices ON (invoice_lines.jsonb -> 'invoiceId'::text) = (invoices.jsonb -> 'id'::text);

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW voucher_lines_view AS SELECT voucher_lines.id AS id, voucher_lines.jsonb AS jsonb, jsonb_build_object('acqUnitIds', vouchers.jsonb->'acqUnitIds') || voucher_lines.jsonb AS metadata FROM voucher_lines LEFT JOIN vouchers ON (voucher_lines.jsonb -> 'voucherId'::text) = (vouchers.jsonb -> 'id'::text);
